level.text: An employer shall require an employee who operates a commercial vehicle to have a commercial driver’s license.
An employer shall not knowingly allow an employee to operate a commercial motor vehicle during any period in which the employee has:
A driver’s license suspended, revoked, or cancelled;
Lost the right to operate or been disqualified from operating a commercial motor vehicle; or
More than one commercial motor vehicle license.
